APARTMENT AVAILABLE: April 1
$2975 per month
2 Bedrooms (or 1 BR with home office*) and 2 Full Bathrooms
*Two floors provide a clear separation of space.
Location:
The famous 500 Block of Delancey Street -- with its red brick pavements, colonial-style light posts and historically maintained homes -- has no straight away traffic into or out of the street; it is only 1 block long. At one end you have Acme Supermarket and CVS. This makes a busy life easier. At the other end, there is The McCall Elementary School. The apartment is within walking distance to fitness centers, the historic Independence Hall, the South Street and Delaware River districts, various places of worship, and public transportation (bus stops and subway entrances for SEPTA and NJ Transit). Also, easy access to major auto routes including PA Expressways, 95 N and S, and NJ bridges.
Features Listed Alphabetically:
Award-Winning Garden
Balcony
2 Bedrooms (2nd bedroom can be an office or guestroom/den.)
Cable Ready
California Closet System
Clothes Washer and Dryer
Full Bath with Tub
Full Bath with Shower
Garbage Disposal
Mitsubishi Split System (Heat/AC)
Parking Permit #5/Local Garage Options
Personal Storage Area
Refrigerator/Freezer
Security Camera
Stove/Oven
Water Included

description: Spacious Port Richmond Home! Perfectly located in the charming neighborhood of Port Richmond and offering 3BD/1.5BAs, this is an amazing turn-key opportunity for all! Upon entering, you will notice the spacious front four season room perfect for enjoying a morning cup of coffee or housing all your indoor plants! This room leads into the main living space featuring an open concept design where the living room flows directly into the formal dining room. With beautiful neutral flooring and arched doorway detailing, these rooms could be transformed to fit any design style. Located directly off the dining area is the convenient half bath. The tastefully upgraded kitchen is equipped with subway tile backsplash, sleek white cabinetry, and stainless-steel appliances. Also offering a laundry closet or pantry directly within the kitchen. The kitchen leads directly into the back patio space. This area would be a great spot for grilling and entertaining guests. Upstairs is home to 3 bedrooms and 1 full bath. Each bedroom features modern flooring and large windows for an abundance of natural light. Don't need 3 bedrooms? Turn one into a home office, workout room, or playroom! Lastly the hall bathroom is equipped with a modern vanity and stall shower/tub combo! Conveniently close to all shops and restaurants in the neighborhood. Not to mention, I-95 is in close proximity for all your commuting needs. But don't take our word for it. Come see this clean and well cared for home yourself by scheduling your showing now!

title: HISTORIC Philly "Trinity" HOUSE! Orig Detail/Renovated! HERMAN'S!
description:
* Available NOW! *
* Interested in seeing this house, maybe even on short notice? Email us from this listing or (especially for short-notice requests) text or call  show contact info
. *
** Yes it's quirky... a vintage 1800s Philly "trinity" house, with a bohemian 1970s renovation. This means incredible original hardwood floors and handcrafted kitchen cabinets, among other distinguishing characteristics. The house is newly upgraded with central a/c, a stainless steel dishwasher, Ikea modular shelving system over the refrigerator and gas stove, and more! **
Move into this RENOVATED & UPGRADED 3-story, 2-bedroom vintage 19th-century traditional "trinity" townhouse. This historic, uniquely Philadelphia-style home features refinished ORIGINAL hardwood floors and ceramic tiled kitchen & bathroom. There's central air conditioning throughout the house and your own washing machine & dryer in the basement. Plus a private patio & 2nd floor deck!
304 Sears Street
Queen Village Adjacent / Pennsport, Philadelphia
Monthly Rent: $1595
Utilities: Gas, Electric & Water on your own meters.
Lease:	1 year lease required, then month-to-month w/winter term.
Move-in:	1st & last month + security.
Pets: Cat OK with pet addendum and deposit.
Living Room: Solid wood door opens into super-cozy living room with original refinished hardwood floors & small coat closet. Keep walking to. . .
Kitchen/Patio: . . .w/Mexican ceramic tile floor set against original (now non-functioning) small fireplace. Handcrafted original wood kitchen cabinets remain from a rustic 1970s renovation. Clean white tile kitchen countertop & stainless steel sink with new dishwasher. Gas stove, refrigerator w/modular Ikea shelving. Your kitchen screen door allows summer breezes from the rear private patio to cool the house.
Basement: Your own washer & dryer + storage space!
Second floor: Original circular wood stairs lead up to 2nd floor hall w/original hardwood plank flooring. Full bathroom at the front of the house with ceramic tile, vanity & medicine cabinet. 2nd floor bedroom also has hardwood floor with sliding glass doors opening onto a south-facing exterior deck.
Third floor: Climb another set of circular steps to the top floor, where you'll find a second bedroom w/original hardwood floors and a super-high vaulted ceiling. There's another small room on the third floor, too -- great as a computer room, home office, extra large walk-in closet, etc.
Location: You're just a few blocks south of Washington Avenue, right off one of Queen Village's main North/South thoroughfares, East Moyamensing Avenue. Herman's Coffee and gourmet market is just a few steps from your front door! Don't miss the Vietnamese, Chinese, Korean & Mexican restaurants, supermarkets & stores on Washington Blvd, Front Street to Broad Street. Right around the corner is the Italian restaurant, Caffe Valentino. Even closer is our neighborhood beer garden, Pennsport Beer Boutique and their sister sandwich shop, Jaxx Steaks. Prefer fried chicken and homemade donuts? Federal Donuts is just a few blocks away. It's a 10-minute walk to the historic Italian Market & Pat's & Geno's Cheesesteaks. Also walk to South Street's shopping & restaurants. Pennsport is the home to Philadelphia's Mummers; "2" Street, just 2 blocks east, hosts street parties throughout the year.

title: Don't take a peek, unique home, you probably want a cookie cutter home
description:
Welcome to the Hilltop community! This ground level one bedroom condo in the Summit section of Hilltop is conveniently located in Brookhaven Boro. Bright and spacious, this unit offers a shared living room and dining area with large sliding glass doors leading from the living room to a ground floor patio with plenty of privacy. The beautifully updated kitchen offers granite countertops, tiled backsplash, stainless steel appliances, vinyl plank floors, and plenty of beautiful wood cabinets for storage. The updated bath features a tiled tub/shower,and granite vanity. The nicely sized bedroom features a large walk-in closet with plenty of space. Washer and dryer are included in the unit in a hallway closet area providing more storage space! Community amenities include swimming pool, tennis courts, playground, and clubhouse. Convenient to downtown Media and West Chester with many fabulous restaurants and bars, shops, and local theater. Easy access to major roads and public transportation to center city Philadelphia. Schedule an appointment to see this lovely rental today!

We offer the premier location for apartment homes in Lafayette Hill. With a great location and easy access to I-476 (Veteran's Memorial Hwy), you will love calling The Glen Apartments your home. Residents of our Lafayette Hill apartment rentals enjoy our one, two, and three bedroom floor plans that add a touch of style and sophistication to any lifestyle. title: BEAUTIFUL and Modern Fishtown 3 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom Home!
description:
This beautiful three-story home is located in the heart of Fishtown, which Forbes Magazine described as one of the best neighborhoods to live in the U.S.!
On the first floor, the home has a recently remodeled kitchen with a ton of natural lighting, stainless steel appliances, a built-in dishwasher and a wrap around counter for eating, working or hanging out.
There is hard wood flooring throughout the home with a smart Nest thermostat which operates the gas heat and electric central air conditioning. Water is included in your rent. There is full semi-finished basement for storage and laundry.
The outdoor patio is also in the process of an update, with a new Moroccan style, tiled wall being built. Included are older and recent pictures of the yard to give you a sense of the space.
There are a total of three bedrooms and two full bathrooms. The second floor has one large bedroom and one smaller bedroom, perfect for an office, guest room, meditation room, or nursery. The second floor also has a full bathroom with a tub. On the third floor, the master bedroom runs the entire length of the house and also has it's own newly renovated in-suite, full bathroom with a large soaking bathtub.
This listing can be furnished or unfurnished. Let us know if you have a preference!
The people living in this neighborhood are truly wonderful. We lived her for 10 years and Fishtown just keeps getting better and better.
Parking:
There's street parking available with no time limit and no permit required.
We are walking distance to the Market-Frankford line, which will quickly take you to Center City, University City, Old City, South Philly, and more ($2.25 token fee). Lyft and Uber are always nearby and typically arrive in ~3 minutes. We are also close to I 95 as well.
Popular nearby:
Fishtown is one of the best neighborhoods in Philly! We are walking distance to some of the greatest cafes, bars and restaurants in both Fishtown and Northern Liberties:

title: 1BR Apartment available Feb 1-  $975
description:
Cute apartment available for rent in South Philly near 7th and Tasker! My roommate and I moved in together to save money but it's time to have our own rooms. Its a very quaint one bedroom apartment ideal for the single person or a couple. VERY spacious bedroom and living area with multiple laundromats walking distance.
If the adorable apartment is not enough, you are walking distance to East Passyunk with multiple restaurants, boutiques and some night life! Around the corner you can find my favorite Mexican grocery store with all your authentic essentials.
If you like the place, I can put you in touch with the landlord. He would need a $60 application fee along with a refundable deposit equal to one months rent.
Let us know if you'd like to see it, we'll show you around and put you in touch with the landlord if you like it.
PS: There are two air conditioners that belong to the property, but there is no central air. The photos are representative of the previous tenant, currently there's a bit more stuff in the home due to moving.

description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient.
